entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
